summary: Bug fix testing completed for Hair Salon Booking App. All 7 backend tests passed for slot validation, admin reschedule, admin delete, and admin cancel functionality. Frontend UI testing verified all admin buttons (Sposta, Annulla, Elimina) and modals work correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: ESLint warning in AdminAppointments.js line 72: useEffect missing dependency 'fetchAppointments' - minor issue, does not affect functionality
seed_data_creation: Test appointments created and cleaned up during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All bug fixes verified working: 1) Slot validation prevents double booking (returns 400 error with Italian message), 2) Admin can reschedule appointments via PATCH /admin/appointments/{id} with date_time, 3) Admin can delete appointments via DELETE /admin/appointments/{id}, 4) Admin can cancel appointments via PATCH /admin/appointments/{id} with status=cancelled. Frontend has Sposta/Annulla/Elimina buttons with confirmation dialogs.

slot_validation.details: POST /api/appointments returns 400 with 'Questo orario non è più disponibile' when slot is occupied

admin_reschedule.details: PATCH /api/admin/appointments/{id} with date_time successfully moves appointment. Also validates slot availability before moving.

admin_delete.details: DELETE /api/admin/appointments/{id} permanently removes appointment from database

admin_cancel.details: PATCH /api/admin/appointments/{id} with status=cancelled changes appointment status. Cancelled slots become available again.

reschedule_modal_ui.details: Modal shows client name, service, date picker, time picker, and Conferma Spostamento button

delete_dialog_ui.details: Dialog shows warning about permanent deletion with Elimina Definitivamente button

cancel_dialog_ui.details: Dialog shows message about cancellation notification with Annulla Appuntamento button

whatsapp_twilio.reason: TWILIO credentials not configured in backend/.env
whatsapp_twilio.impact: WhatsApp notifications will not be sent
